fields.content:
%student_name%,

Welcome to Trade School!

You successfully enrolled in: %class_title% on: %class_date_time%

You agreed to bring:
%student_items%

Classes are held at: %venue_address%

We can reach you at %student_email% or %student_phone%.

Please email %branch_email% if you have any questions or concerns.

Thanks!


PS: If you have to cancel, just click %class_unregister_link%. If you cancel less than 48 hours before the class occurs, you still owe your teacher %student_items%!
fields.subject: Welcome to Trade School!

fields.content:
Hello Trade Schooler,

This is a reminder about your class tomorrow.

You are signed up to attend "%class_title%" with %teacher_name% from %class_start_time% on %class_date%.

We're excited to see you!

Trade School is in at %venue_address%. Please arrive on time with what you agreed to bring: %student_items%

If you have any questions you can email %branch_email%.
If you have to cancel, just click %class_unregister_link%. You're canceling less than 48 hours before the class occurs, so you still owe your teacher  %student_items%!

Until tomorrow,
%branch_title%
fields.subject: a reminder about your class tomorrow

fields.content:
%student_name%,

We hope that you enjoyed %class_title% yesterday. Do you have any constructive feedback for %teacher_name% about %class_title%? Please be specific, remember that Trade School is a space of mutual respect, and keep in mind that teachers are always learning how to share information.

Your feedback will be ANONYMOUSLY delivered to %teacher_name%.

Please give %teacher_name% feedback %student_feedback_link%.

Thanks,
Trade School %branch_title%


PS: Do you want to get more involved?
If you want to support Trade School with time, please contact %branch_email%.
If you want to support Trade School with money (for supplies), please do so {here https://www.thefield.org/Profile.aspx?SAID=2141}.
fields.subject: how was your class?

fields.content:
Hi %teacher_name%,

Thanks for proposing a class!

If everything looks good, your class "%class_title%" will be approved very soon!

If you need to change your proposal, you can make edits using %class_edit_link%

We'll let you know when you class is accepted and added to the schedule.

If you have any questions email %branch_email%.
fields.subject: thanks for submitting a class!

fields.content:
Hi %teacher_name%,

Your class, "%class_title%" has been approved and is scheduled for %class_date% from %class_time%. You can view it on the Trade School home page (http://tradeschool.ourgoods.org).

Please arrive 15-30 minutes early, to set up.

If you have any questions, email %branch_email% or call us at %branch_phone%

We can't wait to learn from you!


PS: A Reminder....

HOW IT WORKS
Trade School is a space of mutual respect where students barter with teachers for instruction. Teachers submit a class description with a date/time they can teach and a list of items they want in exchange for teaching. Once a class submission is approved, it will be posted to the website. On the day of class, teachers and students meet at Trade School, barter items are given to the teacher, and the class occurs.

THE SPACE
Trade School is in at %venue_address%. The room can hold roughly %venue_capacity% people. There is %venue_resources%. You can arrange the space in ANY way you like.
fields.subject: your class has been approved!

fields.content:
Hi %teacher_name%,

We're excited to see you tomorrow!

Your class, "%class_title%" is scheduled for %class_date_time%.

Please arrive 15-30mins early to set up.

Trade School is at %venue_address%. The room can hold roughly %venue_capacity% people. It has %venue_resources%. You can arrange the space in ANY way you like. 

Your students will receive an email reminder today as well.

Here is your class list and what each student agreed to bring:
%student_list%

If you have any questions email %branch_email% or call %branch_phone%.

See you later!
%branch_organizer%
fields.subject: We're excited to see you tomorrow!

fields.content:
%teacher_name%, We hope that you enjoyed teaching %class_title% yesterday. Do you have any constructive feedback for the Trade School organizers? Please be specific and keep in mind that Trade School is an all-volunteer organization.

Please give us feedback here %teacher_feedback_link%. Thanks, Trade School %branch_title% PS: Do you want to get more involved? If you want to support Trade School with time, please contact %branch_email% If you want to support Trade School with money (for supplies), please do so here (https://www.thefield.org/Profile.aspx?SAID=2141)
fields.subject: how did it go?
